name: SnakesXPII
description:
SaveGame/LoadGame = F5/F6

To get into the previous room, use BACKSPACE.

Use Arrow keys to move the snake around.

Snake eats fruit and can freeze crabs. Snakes can eat small frozen crabs.

Hold down SPACE bar to shoot ice torpedo and use ARROW keys to move ice torpedo. Release the SPACE bar, and the snake will start to move again.
